system.requirements:
Tier 1; Commerce, Perception 30 
Aptitudes: Perception, Social
system.effect:
Character has learned where to make discreet inquiries to get involved within black markget trades, and gains +20 to Commerce Tests to Trade or Barter Excess Gear. 
Additionally, they gain +10 to Deceive Tests to avoid or deflect notice about such dealings.

description.value: Character has learned where to make discreet inquiries to get involved within black markget trades, and gains +20 to Commerce Tests to Trade or Barter Excess Gear. Additionally, they gain +10 to Deceive Tests to avoid or deflect notice about such dealings.
